Boundary layer measurement in MTL wind tunnel, KTH February-August 2016 
 
Details about the experiments can be found in: Experimental realisation of near-equilibrium adverse-pressure-gradient turbulent boundary layers, ETFS 
Contact scientist: Ramis Oerlue ramis@mech.kth.se 
 
Date:  04-Nov-2019 
orig. case name: Trip6_may15_x3900mm_30ms_R12 
HW diameter [micron]:  1.25 
HW length in viscous units [-]: 13.7 
HW Overheat ratio [%]:  80 
sampling freq. [Hz]:  60000 
Number of samples:  5400000 
Temperature [C]:  19.21 
atm. pressure [Pa]:  100181.3924 
kin. viscosity [m^2/s]:  1.5154e-05 
Downstream position (from leading edge) [mm]: 3900 
Freestream vel. [m/s]:  25.2742 
Friction velocity [m/s]: 0.75403 
Viscous length scale [m]: 2.0098e-05 
 
Calculated values: 
Displacement thickness, d1 [m]: 0.015939

Re_tau:  3907
